title: Witch Bolt
content:
ng Throw: None At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial damage (first turn only) increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 1st.

How to Acquire Witch Bolt

Witch Bolt can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight Witch Bolt can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight

Witch Bolt Tips & Notes
